author: Carol S
title: Fantastic Hotel. This is not my first stay at the elegant Lubrary Hotel. We love it. The staff are warm and helpful.
text:
The Libray Hotel. It is a well situated boutique hotel. Walking distance to the MOMO and theater district. Staff are warm and friendly. Love the upstairs intimate bar. We enjoyed the fireplace and drinking a glass of scotch following a cold and brisk walk. Also enjoyed reading the New York Times in the lovely breakfast room. Great intimate and understated hotel !
